name: Battery-ouT (itch)
description:
Welcome to the world of Battery-ouT, where you control Midori, a robot who can reroute his power between his abilities. But if his power runs out, it's all over!

This game features:

-An ability system where you can switch between "Weapon+ , Shield and Thruster" modes and use them to beat your way through the levels.

-A charismatic robot!

-Less charismatic enemy robots!

-Lasers!

-Batteries!

-And more!
